meanings.definition: A type of glaze applied over a previously fired ceramic piece to add color or decoration.
meanings.sent1: The artist carefully applied the overglazes to the vase to create a beautiful design.
meanings.sent2: The overglazes on the pottery made it stand out among the other pieces in the exhibit.
meanings.sent3: The overglazes seemed to dance on the surface of the bowl, bringing it to life.
meanings.sent4: Her skillful use of overglazes transformed the plain plate into a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant overglazes shimmered in the sunlight, captivating everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: The process of applying a glaze over a ceramic piece to enhance its appearance.
meanings.sent1: After the firing, the artist began the delicate task of adding the overglazes.
meanings.sent2: The overglazes were carefully brushed onto the ceramic to give it a glossy finish.
meanings.sent3: The overglazes seemed to have a mind of their own, spreading across the surface with ease.
meanings.sent4: The overglazes acted like a magic potion, turning the dull pottery into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: With each stroke, the overglazes brought out the intricate details of the sculpture.
